relationships.initial_dynamic: Former friends with unresolved romantic tension, now client and social worker
relationships.power_balance: Maya has institutional power, Nico has street knowledge
relationships.core_tension: Maya wants to save Nico through the system, Nico knows the system can't save him
relationships.evolution: Book 1: Strained professional. Book 2: Allies in building alternative economy. Book 3: Maya realizes Nico was right, joins his cause fully

relationships.initial_dynamic: Business partners in drug trade, guarded friendship
relationships.power_balance: Kade has more experience and connections, Nico is younger and more ambitious
relationships.core_tension: Nico wants more from life, Kade has given up
relationships.evolution: Book 1: Kade reluctantly helps with the money scheme. Book 2: Becomes Nico's enforcer and right hand. Book 3: Sacrifices himself to protect Nico's legacy

relationships.initial_dynamic: Cat and mouse - small-time criminal vs. law enforcement
relationships.power_balance: Wright has all institutional power, but Nico gains social power
relationships.core_tension: Nico proves the system is failing while Wright tries to maintain it
relationships.evolution: Book 1: Wright dismisses Nico. Book 2: Sees him as serious threat. Book 3: Final confrontation where Wright must choose between orders and conscience

relationships.initial_dynamic: She dismisses him as another junkie dealer
relationships.power_balance: Lin has community respect and moral authority, Nico has money
relationships.core_tension: Lin tests if Nico's charity is real or ego-driven
relationships.evolution: Book 1: She's skeptical but watches. Book 2: Becomes his advisor and conscience. Book 3: Witnesses his martyrdom, carries his story forward

relationships.initial_dynamic: Professional cooperation - social services and security
relationships.power_balance: Wright has authority, Maya has none
relationships.core_tension: Maya sees people to help, Wright sees problems to manage
relationships.evolution: Book 1: Cordial. Book 2: Maya increasingly opposes his methods. Book 3: She actively works against him

relationships.initial_dynamic: She knows him as the neighborhood junkie with medical skills
relationships.power_balance: Equal - both respected for different reasons
relationships.core_tension: She wants him to get clean and use his skills properly, he thinks he's beyond saving
relationships.evolution: Book 1: Distant. Book 2: She recruits him to run medical clinic. Book 3: She grieves his death as a son

relationships.initial_dynamic: She dislikes him as Nico's enabler
relationships.power_balance: Maya has legitimacy, Kade has practical knowledge
relationships.core_tension: Different philosophies of help - harm reduction vs. abstinence
relationships.evolution: Book 1: Mutual dislike. Book 2: Grudging respect as they work together. Book 3: Maya regrets judging him when she understands his sacrifice
